content:
In the Avdeevsky direction, the Russians are equal to the land thanks to the strong interaction of Ukrainian artillery and drones. A video appeared on the network in which one Ukrainian tank is fighting against three enemy.

Thanks to the joint efforts of 33 separate mechanized brigade and artillerymen, 148 separate artillery brigade of the Armed Forces destroyed the Russian Hyacinth. Finally, the fat FPV-Dron came to the house in which the invaders were hiding.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Sergey Lipko and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
title: Arta mixes orcs with a bog, fat FPV destroyed the Russians in an ambush: a stream from the frontline city
description: Thanks to the joint efforts of 33 separate mechanized brigade and artillerymen 148 separate ...
author: Army Inform
